scripts.deploy-main: node scripts/deploy-prep.js mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ wswarren12/poolparty-main
scripts.deploy-test: node scripts/deploy-prep.js kovan && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ wswarren12/poolparty-clone-dev
